Onchain Pension, Savings & Credit

Fundora helps you lock savings, earn, and borrow responsibly.

•
Lock & Save
Create timelocked vaults for future withdrawals.
Learn more.
•
Borrow
Borrow stablecoins up to 60% of your vault.
Learn more.
•
Faucet
Mint mock USDC on the faucet for testing.
Learn more.

How Fundora works?

1
Connect Wallet
Use your favorite web3 wallet to sign in — your address becomes your Fundora account.
2
Deposit & Lock
Create a timelocked vault with mock USDC deposits.
3
Borrow & Repay
Borrow within limits and repay before your vault unlocks.
